mapper.select: select m.id materialid, m.sku sku,m.name name,IFNULL(p.location,p.url) image,i.fulfillable fulfillable, m2.id fromid, m2.sku fromsku, i2.fulfillable fromfulfillable, a.amount,m2.name fromname, IFNULL(p2.location,p2.url) location from t_erp_changewh_form_entry a left join t_erp_material m on a.material_to = m.id left join t_erp_material m2 on a.material_from = m2.id left join t_picture p on m.image=p.id left join t_picture p2 on m2.image=p2.id left join t_erp_changewh_form f on f.id=a.formid left join ( select shopid,warehouseid,materialid , sum( case when status='inbound' then quantity else 0 end ) inbound, sum( case when status='outbound' then quantity else 0 end ) outbound, sum( case when status='fulfillable' then quantity else 0 end ) fulfillable from t_erp_inventory group by shopid,warehouseid,materialid ) i on i.materialid=m.id and i.warehouseid=f.warehouseid left join ( select shopid,warehouseid,materialid , sum( case when status='inbound' then quantity else 0 end ) inbound, sum( case when status='outbound' then quantity else 0 end ) outbound, sum( case when status='fulfillable' then quantity else 0 end ) fulfillable from t_erp_inventory group by shopid,warehouseid,materialid ) i2 on i2.materialid=m2.id and i2.warehouseid=f.warehouseid where a.formid = #{formid,jdbcType=CHAR}
